website_summaries.verdict: There were complaints that the Propet Village Walker was ugly and bulky, but most appreciated its style as it went well with their work and everyday clothes. Many people raved about how comfortable it is and how it alleviated pain in the lower extremities, but there were also claims that the insole quickly lost its plushness. But the overall feedback about the product was predominantly positive.
pros: A vast majority of owners raved about the comfort delivered by the Propet Village Walker
there were claims made by golden agers that it did not need to be broken in and it relieved foot, leg, and knee pains
A myriad of consumers liked the design and style of the trainer because it looked great when paired with casual, work, and even formal clothing
Numerous testers were pleased that it came in various width options because they were able to find the perfect fit — snug at the heel and roomy at the toe area
The collar delivered adequate ankle support, said plenty of wearers
Multiple shoppers appreciated that the merchandise accommodated the use of custom orthotics
The traction delivered by the outsole impressed several individuals
The footwear was deemed reasonably priced by some buyers
cons: A significant number of people did not find the Propet Village Walker stylish enough for everyday wear and thought that it looked too clunky
According to more than a few critics, the insole collapsed after a few months of regular wear and resulted in foot pain with continued use
The upper was not breathable and caused the foot to sweat, especially when worn during hot weathers
Some folks did not appreciate the rocker bottom because they felt like they were always leaning forward
The weight of the product was too heavy for a handful of consumers who are advanced in age

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Light shoe with Excellent Support
customer_reviews.text: Got these shoes after being gifted a set of lowcut boots to replace some worn ducks. So impressed with the support I bought three additional pairs. They fit snug so you might consider a 1/2 size larger especially if you plan to put orthopedic inserts. High Quality, nice color, leather uppers, and light weight. Also apparently Medicare-approved for diabetics. Hav'nt attempted to see if I could get a script for them but I'll try. In any event, use the wardrobe return option with Amazon and get a couple different sizes returning the shoes that don't quite fit as desired. Apparently, you have 7 days to try them under this option before getting charged.
customer_reviews.author: W. L. HUGHES

customer_reviews.title: Not Consistent
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this shoe on two previous occasions, both times being a great purchase. The shoes wore very well and held up nicely. This time is a different story. They changed the smooth leather to a grained leather which is really no big deal because the shoe still looks great. My issue is with the soles. I have only worn them for about a month and already the heels are showing signs of a slant. I know it is because of the way I walk but usually takes much longer to wear. I believe changes in this product will cause me to look elsewhere for footwear.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy M. Radford

customer_reviews.title: Serious drop in quality.
customer_reviews.text: For several years the Village Walker (dept. store-bought) was my everyday shoe. The last pair I bought, one of the eyelet failed in three weeks. I switched brands and had to replace in about six months. I bought these hoping for better quality... and the right sole collapsed at the outside of my heel after two days. I am now using the right shoe from my three-year old pair (cracked sole on left after 2.5 years).
customer_reviews.author: JPP

customer_reviews.title: Good looking lightweight shoe withe excellent support
customer_reviews.text: Got these shoes after being gifted a set of lowcut boots to replace some worn ducks. So impressed with the support I bought three additional pairs. They fit snug so you might consider a 1/2 size larger especially if you plan to put orthopedic inserts. High Quality, nice color, leather uppers, and light weight. Also apparently Medicare-approved for diabetics. Hav'nt attempted to see if I could get a script for them but I'll try. In any event, use the wardrobe return option with Amazon and get a couple different sizes returning the shoes that don't quite fit as desired. Apparently, you have 7 days to try them under this option before getting charged.
customer_reviews.author: W. L. HUGHES

customer_reviews.title: Best walkers for seniors
customer_reviews.text: They won't win a style contest but they are great shoes for walking. I think they may be my all time favorite. Light, plenty of room in the toe box, not too heavy. I've read that others have had issues with cracking soles, I've yet to experience this but until I do. They have extra depth for orthotics which I need. High recommendation .
customer_reviews.author: Bill B.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes squeak when walking
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased these for me for Valentines Day. For the week they have started squeak when walking. Has anyone had this happen? Is there something that can be done to reduce the squeak or make it go away? Can the shoes be replaced. They should not be doing this after only 2 months of wear. Any help is appreciated. Otherwise, they are very comfortable for me with a 4-5E wide foot. Tough to find wide comfortable shoes. The comfort is still there but the squeak is really bad. I have tried to remove the liner, dry them on a heater and let them sit for a few days with no change. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: diana hatfield

customer_reviews.title: For Those Who Enjoy Walking
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th pair of this model of Propet shoes. Now I have the black, brown and light brown colors. They are very comfortable. After trying on same size shoe from other brands, I purchased this shoe, which is well worth the cost, and I like the color. If you like to walk, this shoe costs less than a penny (only an estimate) a mile.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Walking good in the Neighborhood
customer_reviews.text: i wear these to do yard work, I wear them in my wood working shop. heck, I wore them to Walmart. folks say they look nice too. I bought two pair, one for every day, the other for casual dress to go to town. I love tennis shoes, as most folks do, but I have become allergic to the materials in tennis shoes. They burn my toes, similar to a chemical burn. Leather does not irritate. I wanted Red Wings, I have had 6 pair, they are great, used to cost $125. Now they are $300, ouch. Propet is an affordable good alternative.GOPROPET. Yeah buddy.
customer_reviews.author: Rocketbob

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes, but defective materials or manufacture. I would never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking shoes and comfortable to wear. But my pair (Size 11.5 M) only lasted a few hours. The sole of the right shoe became almost totally detached. Either materials are defective or manufacture is substandard.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sotil

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite. I have flat wide feet and don't find these particularly comfortable. I'm sure they are perfectly good for some folks. They seem to be well made and run true to size. Make sure you need a wide width if you're ordering the shoes that way. These shoes run a little wider than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. I have huge duck shaped feet and these are, if anything, too wide as a 4E - if I was to re-order I’d try the 2E width next time. They are the ugliest shoes I have ever owned — Look like prescription shoes from a podiatrist. But I can stand and walk in them all day.
customer_reviews.author: S. Moon

customer_reviews.title: PROPET VILLAGE WALKER BLACK SHOES ARE IDEAL FOR WORK!
customer_reviews.text: Propet Village Walker shoes are fantastic for both work and casual wear. Durably built, and very comfortable sole lasts for a long time! Oxford style design is acceptable at all of my public safety jobs that require black colored work shoes. Sure wished these were available decades ago when I needed them for long shifts standing on my feet! Donald E. White, Secretary-Treasurer, Alexandria Rescue Squad, Inc., Alexandria, VA.
customer_reviews.author: Donald E. White

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETELY BROKEN SOLE after very little use
customer_reviews.text: I've been keeping these shoes in the closet as my "good shoes" that I wear only occasionally. The last time I went to put them on, I noticed that the soles and heels are already worn through to the underlying material, and one of the soles is COMPLETELY BROKEN into two pieces. The leather upper parts of the shoes still look like new, but after very little wear, I can see my foot through a massive break in the half-inch-thick manmade sole, right across the ball of the foot. I have a picture of the deceased, but this vendor doesn't allow consumers to upload photographs of their casualties.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kopke

customer_reviews.title: Love these Walkers
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these for years. Bought these after getting my Good Feet Insoles and they have been my go to shoe ever sense. Price was great especially with the discount they added at checkout. Went back and bought a pair of the brown too.
customer_reviews.author: Lem Klein

customer_reviews.title: Great people to do business with.
customer_reviews.text: I had to send the shoes back because they were too small. The seller replaced them with a larger size. The new shoes were a little too large but my foot doesn't match any standard size. The seller was top notch and made sure I got something I could wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Theses are not like original Propet walkers
customer_reviews.text: Theses are not like original Propet walkers. The original footbed/insoles aren't in them and they have even cut back on the number of shoe lace holes to just 3. And to just add to that, they don't last nearly as long as they use to.
customer_reviews.author: Jock D.

customer_reviews.title: Really great shoes for dress and work
customer_reviews.text: I loved these shoes from prior experience. These are especially great if you are on your feet a lot and do a lot of walking. I keep my old ones for outside work and they're still found well after 3 years of welding and outdoor work. This new pair are for dress wear and should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: PairofNoids

customer_reviews.title: A good value!
customer_reviews.text: So far as I have just begun wearing them as I did all day yesterday; they seem to be a good quality shoe at a fair price for value and serviceability! If you are an older male with total joint replacements; this would be a good buy and a worthy investment in footwear. I have three total joint replacements and one arthroscopic surgery already on one kneww as well. I spent sometime walking in them and plan to wear them for everyday wear. Breaking them in might take some time as they are pretty stiff, but hope they hold up. I wear diabetic inserts and will need to get a new set soon!
customer_reviews.author: crosscountryman

customer_reviews.title: Sole separates from upper after getting wet
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe. Unfortunately, I had to walk thru shallow water in a parking lot and it caused the sole to separate from the upper on both shoes. What is it with they glue they use that a single exposure to water causes them to fail?
customer_reviews.author: Keenan J. Kline

customer_reviews.title: one of the best walking shoes (updated:  durability is dubious!)
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Propet walking shoes. The first pair lasted me 2 years, and I walk a lot. They are very light, yet very comfortable, with excellent arch support. The color is a bit of a darker, richer brown than is pictured. ***Update: as much as I like these, I'm disappointed in durability with this pair. I bought them in May 2017 and just noticed that the sole has a crack completely across it. As you can see, the tread doesn't have that much wear to justify this much of a crack.
customer_reviews.author: Whereupon

customer_reviews.title: Finally found a comfortable shoe that fits!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a pair of shoes fit as comfortably as these. Because I have short, very wide feet with a high top of my foot. All my life, I have struggled with too narrow shoes, always having to buy 1.5 or so sizes higher just to get the width. I could sometimes find tennis shoes wide enough, but never a nice shoe like this I bought the eee width and they fit well. Finally, a shoe my size that can be purchased in extra extra wide width. Every happy
customer_reviews.author: Honkwomp

customer_reviews.title: This walking shoe IS great for walking
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband just before a six week vacation that involved miles and miles and miles of walking. He suffers from gout and extensive walking can be an issue. These shoes were the answer. Reasonably priced, and extremely comfortable (according to the one who wears them).
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A

customer_reviews.title: Boxy, wide, stiff and loose
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot (12 A/B) so I ordered the 12 Narrow (B). These are more like a standard D width; too loose to wear with comfort and their stiffness means that they slip off with each step.
customer_reviews.author: BK

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 15 so I have limited choices. I purchased these when looking for something to take on a long European trip & cruise where I wanted something that could be worn for both sight seeing and dress up casual in order to keep packing down. Something with a decent toe box. These shoes were just to big and clunky looking. They seemed comfortable enough but I just could not bring myself to want to be seen in something that big and ugly that just screams "I'm an old man!" I returned them and ultimately bought a nice pair of Clarks WaveWalk shoes. I found them to be very comfortable and have received several compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: cpqal

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Can't remember a time when I tried on a shoe that fits this well. Very light and extremely comfortable. I'd recommend these shoes to anyone fed up with going to stores that either not carry wide shoes, or "wide" shoes wide not wide enough.....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these shoes several days. The are comfortable and reasonably good looking. I have neuropathy in my feet so fit is important. The width is great and length is correct. Since they are new I do not have feedback on soles splitting. The soles were slippery, so I walked on cement to scuff up the bottoms. This is my 3rd pair of Propet's. The other 2 pair were hiking boots and are still great.
customer_reviews.author: Bob K

customer_reviews.title: Propet Walking Shoes Online
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look well made, but I Have not worn them much at this time. I am wondering if buying shoes online is really a good move since it is hard to know if fit will be proper. The 8 1/2 D I have worn with SAS shoes for the past twenty+ years seems to be slightly tight with these shoes in comparison. I have noticed that other buyers have had trouble with fit problems with shoes purchased in this way. I will know more on this issue as I wear these shoes in the next few months and will try to update this review at that time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that this is thee most comfortable pair of shoes that I've bought for work. I do a lot of standing, walking, climbing stairs, climbing ladders, pushing & pulling heavy equipment & climbing on road cases. Walking on carpet, marble floors, dirt, brick walkways & tiles don't have an effect on the feet. It all feels very very comfortable. It is very well built, true to the size as indicated. The other factor in buying the shoe is their 1000 mile sole wear guarantee. I've never seen this from any other shoe company. I'll be definitely be looking at more of their styles. Thanks Propet.
customer_reviews.author: joe bavarian

customer_reviews.title: Good, but no longer for me
customer_reviews.text: These used to be my favorite shoes, but as time marches on I've found them to be painful for more than a couple hours use. It's not the shoes' fault; my feet just can't handle anything more than complete babying these days. If you're not overweight or suffer from ailments that affect nerves and bones in the feet, these are some of the best walking shoes you can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for bunions
customer_reviews.text: My husband has bunions and very wide feet. He stands at work for hours every day. These shoes are the only ones that don’t kill his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Greenfield

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet and high arches (surprisingly)
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable for my wide feet and high arches. I have not had to put my inserts in these shoes (yet at least) which I was happily surprised by. These are clearly VERY well made (you can actually see the leather stitched to the rubber sole - always an indication of a sturdy, well-crafted shoe). I like the padding around the ankle.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty DudeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good Diabetic shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great price for the product. My father is a diabetic and these shoes work great. He inserts his custom soles inside. Dad loves the color and says it feels great when walking. Will be buying again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Harris

customer_reviews.title: Fish19
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very comfortable, I'm enjoying wearing them. Wish the boot style came in the same size and width.
customer_reviews.author: RDFisher.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son wears a 10 1/2 B, and I order these for him when I can find them for a good price. Narrow shoes for men are very scarce, and always fairly expensive. These are also very comfortable for him.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: A little large in comparison to some other companies. Very light. I'm a bit worried about long term quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He finds them comfortable to walk in using his cashmere socks which are ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these shoes. His feet have grown in width the past few years, so we ordered EE. He finds them comfortable to walk in using his cashmere socks which are thinner and warmer than nylon or acrylic ones.
customer_reviews.author: S. B.

customer_reviews.title: Your feet will love them
customer_reviews.text: This is a ridiculously comfortable walking shoe. I wore it to a wedding reception and ended up walking far more than I'd intended and my feet were very happy. I even danced a few times without any discomfort!
customer_reviews.author: J. Scott Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  Shoes that are comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Over the past 3 years I've spent hundreds of dollars on shoes trying to find a comfortable pair of shoes. I have severe neuropathy so finding comfortable shoes is very hard. After reading the reviews I had to give these shoes a try. I put them on and I felt like I was waking on clouds. HEAVEN! I wore them to work the next day and was able to forget about my pain. The next week I wore them on my out of town trip to Washington, DC and wore them every day. Very comfortable. I just now ordered a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: TimmySF

customer_reviews.title: If you have hard to fit feet don't pass these up...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend is very short yet very wide, picture a short samoan guy :) So along with his short/wide body he has size 9 feet that are pretty swelled up and wide. He HATES shopping for shoes but these were on sale so I decided to take a chance and see how these would work out. He absolutely loves them, they're super comfy, are great work/office shoes yet casual enough to wear with jeans. If these shoes will feet his feet, I would think anyone with special sizes would be happy with these...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For Those Of Us With Wide Feet - There Is Propet..
customer_reviews.text: For those of us doomed to walk the earth with wide feet - Propet has once again ridden to our rescue by producing a quality, attractive product that will fit my small yet wide feet. I am an avid walker, and feel I can wear these to work (business casual) and still go for a nice long walk at lunch time in complete comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Bromptonboy

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were very handsome looking when I received them. They have a very comfortable insole so walking all day in them is not a problem. They pair well with jeans or light colored trousers. I purchased this as a gift for my uncle and he looked sharp in them! I'm going to have to get myself a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Propet Village Walkers are very comfortable shoes from day one, and seem to be well made and durable. I already had a brown pair that I've been wearing a while, and ordered this black pair. Both of my pairs feature 4 pairs of eyelets, even though the picture now showed only three pairs. Not sure if that's the old design or a coming new one, but pretty sure it won't really change the comfort or use of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Yutzy

customer_reviews.title: ... b/c he is getting ulcers on his feet from bad circulation and these helped so much
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband b/c he is getting ulcers on his feet from bad circulation and these helped so much. His feet are healing much quicker and he has feeling back in his feet. They fit perfectly for him. He did say it took awhile to wear them in before he could get used to him because he went from not feeling his feet at the end of the day to feeling everything but now his feet are great by the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N Smith

customer_reviews.title: Thousands of Foot Miles on These
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find 5E...these are replacements for same shoe worn over 2 years 5 days a week walking 8 hours at a store. No breakin necessary on this shoe....incredible. Held up great for 2+ years but time to replace. Glad same shoe is still available.
customer_reviews.author: Myakka Lady

customer_reviews.title: Second pair...enough said!
customer_reviews.text: Second pair. Superb support and instantly comfortable. Well made and durable. Second pair exactly as first, consistent manufacturing.
customer_reviews.author: Keko

customer_reviews.title: No Break In!!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby wears size 11EEE which is almost impossible to find in a work shoe. Started working again and fortunately found this shoe again after 3 years. No break in and for a man with bunion problems, taping all toes so no blisters, etc, this is wonderful that no complaints and no sore feet. Went back into Amazon and bought another pair so he can rotate them.
customer_reviews.author: Myakka Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I have reordered and used this type shoe many times. Great shoe ... until the inner-sole starts to breakdown and leaks out as a cream colored powder after about a year.
customer_reviews.author: GSM

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe, sole wearing out very quickly
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd try a new shoe and it took me a couple times to get the right size - this shoe seems to run bigger than expected. Once I got the size dialed in, the shoe is very comfortable. My only issue is that the sole is wearing out after only a few weeks of using the shoes. Going back to my normal New Balance purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Nicely finished leather; fairly good fit for an on-line purchase. Durable -= used for 6 months so far.
customer_reviews.author: E. R. Savage

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found some shoes to ease my husbands foot pain. First it was the need for arch support then the Morton's Nerve irritation kicked in....He is still having some foot pain, but it has drastically improved with these....He now wears these constantly; 1 pair for work and another for casual. Very pleased with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lover of Books!!

customer_reviews.title: Bought as
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband to wear to work, he works on all concrete floors and always complaining about sore achy feet. I like the color because the black goes well with denim and the blue shirt he wears to work. So after wearing them for a few days there was less complaining about achy feet, but still some discomfort. I don't think it is due to the type of shoes he wears it is definitely his feet. He seems to like the shoes just fine, which is a good thing since he is very hard to buy for.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I have this shoe in black and it is wonderful - thought I could use a smaller size but I was wrong. Am returning these for a half size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Girala

customer_reviews.title: Propet Men's M4070 Village Walker Oxford,Brown Grain,9.5 X (US Men's 9.5...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit perfectly. The sole is very firm, almost hard when you stand in them for a few hours. Changing the inserts help as Propet inserts are mostly leather or a material that doesn't cushion or breath well.Very comfortable for walking, but a little hot and hard when you stand for a period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: A good wide shoe
customer_reviews.text: I got a good deal on the shoe and I am happy for now. It fits my foot, which is a miracle. I bought the 9.5 5E. The shoe slips in the heel but probably because I needed to go up a half-size because of my wide right foot.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel good!
customer_reviews.text: I used to have to buy 13's to get a fit on my 11 EEE fat feet, not anymore. Propet has a wide, and not the wide other makers sell, these babies are wide. I can buy an 11EEE from Propet and it fits. They feel good, and look good enough for a business casual work environment. I know where I'm buying my shoes from here on out, Propet!
customer_reviews.author: R. Slone

customer_reviews.title: This style fit very well.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit fine, walked a mile and a half right off the bat. I have found though, with a different style pair, that I had to return as they didn't fit well.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and keep my feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL K.

customer_reviews.title: Love These Shoes - Great for Gout
customer_reviews.text: These are the best shoes ever if you are a gout sufferer. The super extra wide size has tons of room for your toes. I bought these for work, but sometimes wear them out walking and for casual use because they are more comfortable than my tennis shoes. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Cavallo

customer_reviews.title: so soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have a ball of foot issue and these shoes came highly recommended. I am either a 8.5 or nine wide, and other shoes make it difficult to order, especially in the definition of "wide". Even NB shoes have a wide ranging definition of wide. So not knowing about Propet, I ordered 3x. Well, I have to return for wide. Not a big deal. And I have an arch problem that seems to have been solved with these shoes. I HIGHLY recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: C. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today, beautiful, well made, light weight, fit perfectly! I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: belme172

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Good value
customer_reviews.text: It's rare to order and pay for a pair of shoes without trying it on first. This was an exception as I have very wide feet and this 11.5 5E shoe fit me perfectly from the 1st second I put them on. They're classified as casual, but in my wife's and my opinion they look good enough for dressy wear.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brick

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & Style
customer_reviews.text: Welcome to comfort AND style with Propet Men's Village Walker! Dad is 89 & still active. He has worn khaki pants since WWII & tennis shoes , comfy as they are, don't give the image that Dad wants to present. The Propet shoes are just what he was looking for! Nice shine, good looks, great comfort! You've made him happy! Thanks for a job well done !!!
customer_reviews.author: K Law

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN SOLE!
customer_reviews.text: THE FIRST PAIR OF SHOES I RATED 5 STARS; I wore out the first pair; I like them so much I bought a 2nd pair. I wear a 9.5 EEE; the fit was perfect. HOWEVER, on the 2nd pair, the left sole broke after 3 months use. I am hoping this was just an anomoly. If the sole breaks on this 3rd pair I will need to find a new shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jocool

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes been wearing them almost daily for a few months no wear or discomfort. I am also on my feet for between 8 to 13 hours at least 5 days a week. I do plan to order another pair so I have them when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: David Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is the leather appears less textured in the pics than real life and their E is a really wide E so there’s a little slip I the foot bed at first. Super comfy for casual office wear & a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Angus Thermopyle

customer_reviews.title: Not for orthotic use
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable but the height in the toe area is too low. I cannot use any inserts without my toes rubbing on the top of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DM Springer

customer_reviews.title: COMFORT & SUPPORT WHEN IT'S IMPORTANT
customer_reviews.text: My husband has some problems being on his feet at work all day on a concrete floor. He has been wearing different styles of Propet for many years, but a physician advised wearing a lace up rather than the same shoe in a slip on. He loves this shoe. The comfort and support are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good as far as the feel
customer_reviews.text: So far so good as far as the feel, I had to get them a half size bigger then I wanted because they didn`t have nine`s.
customer_reviews.author: M. Q. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for comfort
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable for those with wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Common Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I love them, but if the insoles had a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Very light shoe.. I love them, but if the insoles had a bit more arch support, they would be perfect... No fault on the shoe, but, I rather have a little bit of a "flat foot," and actually went out and bought some arch support inserts and that has made them perfect for me...
customer_reviews.author: D. Garza

customer_reviews.title: Item as described and shipped fast. These shoes are ...
customer_reviews.text: Item as described and shipped fast. These shoes are designed to fit several different orthotics and are deep enough so your foot won't get squashed from the top and sides when they are inserted. I would buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Merrick

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, nice walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, lightweight shoe made for walking. These will be a favorite travel companion!
customer_reviews.author: R. E. Moore

customer_reviews.title: For most not really
customer_reviews.text: if you have wide feet with high arches go for it. for the rest of us not really.
customer_reviews.author: venture st.john

customer_reviews.title: Size runs a little larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good shoe. Arrived a little bigger than I expected. Quick shipping and as described.
customer_reviews.author: Dan D.

customer_reviews.title: Look good and comfortable too
customer_reviews.text: Look good and comfortable too. Slightly large, I have wide feet so upped size to fit, then added insoles to make more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: RAL

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality as I wear them frequently
customer_reviews.text: I owned a pair of these for 12 years and the left shoe began to break down. Very good quality as I wear them frequently. I had searched everywhere for a similar pair to what I had purchased 12 years ago. I tried Google and when I saw Amazon mentioned I clicked on your link as I feel you give the best service I can find.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: im 25 and i wear old man shoes.
customer_reviews.text: because they're UN BE LIEVABLY COMFORTABLE! most comfortable shoes ive ever worn, the soles are huge so you know theyll last a long time. the leather is high quality. wonderful shoes, i love wearing them....and for old people walking shoes, they look casual/dressy when you wear pants over them.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: This is about the fourth or fifth pair my husband has bought. These are my husbands favorite and most comfortable shoe for him and keeps buying a new pair as soon as they wear out. He needs a wide and these fit him great, has them in both black and brown.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Very comfotable, but doesn't breath well
customer_reviews.text: I wear this to work everyday. It's very comfotable and looks good. Only issue is it doesn't breath well, so my feet feel wet most of the time even when I am just sitting at my desk. Most of dress shoes have this issue, but this one seems to be worse than others.
customer_reviews.author: JJ's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: They feel and fit is real good. I am thinking of getting another pair in different color if I can as I haven't looked yet. Quality appears to be 5 stars. My older pairs are M's and are a bit too wide but the narrowest at the time, I think? Anyway these fit Great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dale Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I received were poorly constructed and were uncomfortable. Thanks to Amazon's excellent return policies I was able to quickly exchange the shoes for another pair of the same shoe. This pair fits great and are very comfortable to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stewart

customer_reviews.title: The soles tore into halves after less than a month ...
customer_reviews.text: The soles tore into halves after less than a month. The rubber/plastic material the soles do not hold up flexing, which is shame because the upper portions is really well contsructed.
customer_reviews.author: scuba2nd

customer_reviews.title: They looked so good
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was pretty excited for this shoe. Within a day the sole separated from the rest of the shoe. I returned them for another pair, and after wearing them for an hour the same thing happened. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these shoes and will buy more when needed
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes and will buy more when needed. He wears a 4 or 5E and could not find a wide shoe that was durable for everyday wear to work. He is a carpenter with pain from a recent ankle injury and needs comfortable shoes, as well. He loves these shoes and I hope they last a while. Maybe we have finally found him a good pair of work shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K. Breland

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to find good shoes when you wear a 14 EEE
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband after his VA custom shoes developed a split. He was able to put his orthotics into the shoes, but he finds them to be a bit too snug in the toes. It's hard to find good shoes when you wear a 14 EEE.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh A. Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Proven Technology
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these, took them to Shanghai and walked around 15 exhibition halls today. Did not need pain relievers - but 100% sure I would if I wore anything else. 3rd pair I've owned and I'm in the "Raving Fan" category.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan F. McSheehy Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Lot's of reviews complain about it the looks of the shoe. Makes one wonder what they're loooking for. This is clearly not a dress shoe. It does fit and wears great. A litle heavy but insignificant as long as it fits well. Quality is good. Being relatively new have no idea about durability.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Propet rocks
customer_reviews.text: I have several pair of Propet shoes and one pair of Propet boots, they all are comfortable, well fitting and last longer than expected.The Village Walker is no exception. I would recommend this product to anyone who wants a comfortable reliable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Smith

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same size as I did previously from the Propet website (different style). But this pair is considerably larger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for walking!
customer_reviews.text: These are the second pair I have had and they are great! I wear orthotics and they fit perfectly with no pain. The price is right and of course the shipping is fast. I will continue to buy these as long as they make them
customer_reviews.author: Ron Federico

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable, but I must admit I transferred my custom ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. My first pair lasted for 5 years as the only shoe I wear. They are very comfortable, but I must admit I transferred my custom inserts to them. This is a quality shoe in every respect.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: The original pair (purchased a couple years ago) literally failed. When I contacted Propet they sent me a new pair. Arrived in two days. Great Customer Service. I've been wearing the replacement pair almost exclusively, no problems. I'm happy and would buy from Propet again.
customer_reviews.author: aSoundGuy

customer_reviews.title: nice, but half size too big
customer_reviews.text: very nice shoes. Was hoping to just exchange them, but out of stock on one size smaller (unless I go to a brown shoe)
customer_reviews.author: Leroy A. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the amout of toe room. Did not like that the shoes gave little foot support or even comfort. I am on my feet all day (10+). Did not hold up. This was after only one day. Went back to my previous shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, Good price
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is good. This is always a concern with online shoe purchase. I am familiar with Propet shoes, having worn them before but I had not purchased a pair for 10 years. They appear to be well made and support my feet
customer_reviews.author: hlstone87

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I learned from another pair of Propet shoes that runners and casual shoes fit differently. I took that into account and ordered a more width appropriate size for these shoes and they fit perfectly. I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Bolton

customer_reviews.title: High quality, comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is second pair in this series of Propet shoes that I have purchased. I have foot issues and the 5e size works very well for me. I recommend this brand of footware, very well made and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Henry A. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: Have been wearing these for decades. Never had an issue. One of the few brands that caters to extra wide sizes.
customer_reviews.author: HT-IL

customer_reviews.title: Great Walking Shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a heavy man, and I'm on my feet all day cleaning carpet. This shoe was a perfect fit from day one!! Customers often comment on my shoes and ask where I purchased them. Very happy with purchase, I have bought Clarks for years........but I now can buy 2 different colors for the same investment.
customer_reviews.author: TN Cleaner

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe - great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I wore this style shoe in a Clark for years. They discontinued making the shoe and I was forced to find another shoe that fit as well and that lasted as long. It wasn't easy because I have a short, wide foot with a very high instep. I came across the Propet Village Walker and gave it a try. It became my replacement for the Clarks about 6 or 7 years ago. I really like them and they are about half the price. I really love that too!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Boehm

product_meta.title: Propét Men's Oxford
product_meta.description: Get comfortable, everyday shoes with old-fashioned durability that won't let you down: supple full-grain leather uppers with lined quarters; polyurethane sole for shock absorption and durability; external and internal heel counter for extra firm support; hand-stitched construction for flexibility; and a padded collar and tongue for comfort.
feature_bullets: Features a footbed that can be removed to accommodate custom orthotics
Features antimicrobial properties that help prevent leading causes of foot odor
OrthoLite insoles that are made with open cell, lightweight foams that create a cooler, drier shoe interior without adding unwanted bulk or weight
